headline: PPG inducts five new members into Collegium association, recognizing technology innovations aligned to growth
summary: PITTSBURGH, November 15, 2024--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the induction of five new members into its Collegium, an association of longstanding PPG leaders who have made significant technological contributions that support PPG’s growth, innovation, and longevity.

headline: ArcelorMittal's Earnings Top Estimates, Revenues Lag in Q3
summary: The decline in MT's sales in Q3 is due to lower average selling prices across segments.
